subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: It was a frenzied start to FIFA’s attempt to fill the stands for next year’s World Cup in Brazil as fans applied for more than 1 million tickets in just seven hours.
snippet: It was a frenzied start to FIFA’s attempt to fill the stands for next year’s World Cup in Brazil as fans applied for more than 1 million tickets in just seven hours.
